an6.44:4.1: * Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:4.3: Atha kho migasālā upāsikā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an6.44:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho migasālā upāsikā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an6.44:5.1: “Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṃ?
an6.44:5.2: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an6.44:5.3: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmī satto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapannoti.
an6.44:5.4: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an6.44:5.5: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapannoti.
an6.44:5.6: Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan”ti?
an6.44:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando migasālāya upāsikāya nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an6.44:6.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:6.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.44:7.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ;
an6.44:7.3: Atha kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.44:7.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā maṃ etadavoca:
an6.44:7.6: ‘kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṃ.
an6.44:7.7: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an6.44:7.8: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapannoti.
an6.44:7.9: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an6.44:7.10: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapannoti.
an6.44:7.11: Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan’ti?
an6.44:7.12: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, migasālaṃ upāsikaṃ etadavocaṃ:
an6.44:8.1: “Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇe?
an6.44:8.2: Chayime, ānanda, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an6.44:9.2: Idhānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṃvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.
an6.44:9.3: Tassa savanenapi akataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhati.
an6.44:9.4: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī. (1)
an6.44:10.1: Idha panānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṃvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.
an6.44:10.2: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an6.44:10.3: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā visesāya pareti no hānāya, visesagāmīyeva hoti no hānagāmī. (2)
an6.44:11.2: ‘imassapi teva dhammā aparassapi teva dhammā, kasmā tesaṃ eko hīno eko paṇīto’ti.
an6.44:11.3: Tañhi tesaṃ, ānanda, hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an6.44:12.1: Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṃvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena, tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an6.44:12.2: Ayaṃ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:12.4: Imaṃ hānanda, puggalaṃ dhammasoto nibbahati, tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya aññatra tathāgatena.
an6.44:12.8: Ahaṃ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyyaṃ, yo vā panassa mādiso.
an6.44:13.1: Idha panānanda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamāno adhigato hoti, samayena samayañcassa lobhadhammā uppajjanti.
an6.44:13.2: Tassa savanenapi akataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhati.
an6.44:13.3: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī. (3)
an6.44:14.1: Idha panānanda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamāno adhigato hoti, samayena samayañcassa lobhadhammā uppajjanti.
an6.44:16.1: Idha panānanda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamāno adhigato hoti, samayena samayañcassa vacīsaṅkhārā uppajjanti.
an6.44:16.4: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī. (5)
an6.44:17.1: Idha panānanda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamāno adhigato hoti, samayena samayañcassa vacīsaṅkhārā uppajjanti.
an6.44:17.2: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an6.44:17.3: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā visesāya pareti no hānāya, visesagāmīyeva hoti no hānagāmī. (6)
an6.44:18.3: Kasmā tesaṃ eko hīno, eko paṇīto’ti?
an6.44:18.4: Tañhi tesaṃ, ānanda, hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an6.44:19.1: Tatrānanda, yassa puggalassa kodhamāno adhigato hoti, samayena samayañcassa vacīsaṅkhārā uppajjanti, tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an6.44:19.2: Ayaṃ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an6.44:19.9: Ahaṃ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyyaṃ, yo vā panassa mādiso.
an6.44:20.1: Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariyañāṇe.
an6.44:20.2: Ime kho, ānanda, cha puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an6.44:21.1: Yathārūpena, ānanda, sīlena purāṇo samannāgato ahosi, tathārūpena sīlena isidatto samannāgato abhavissa.
an6.44:21.3: Yathārūpāya ca, ānanda, paññāya isidatto samannāgato ahosi, tathārūpāya paññāya purāṇo samannāgato abhavissa.
an6.44:21.5: Iti kho, ānanda, ime puggalā ubho ekaṅgahīnā”ti.
